attributes.action: The Government should teach more about Mental health, within schools.
attributes.additional_details: So far, I have been in touch with John Mann, who has responded and also wrote to the Minister of State, about my subject. Also I have been in touch with Alastair Campbell, to which he has replied. I hope for my research and campaign to help me within my career and to help others.
attributes.background: I am a 16 year old, from Outwood Academy Portland. Through recent research when studying Citizenship, I have become more and more interested in mental health and I aim to end the stigma and discrimination around it. I believe not enough is taught to teenagers about mental health.
